title: 5aN2n3.jpeg
description: Tough economic condition really bites average American hard.
comments.comment:
He has to spend all his money putting fuel into his car so you can see why times are hard.; <reminiscent sigh> I remember the days of making my your own ammo... <day dreams>; Reminds me of that classic Chris Rock stand-up...

“You don’t need no gun control, you know what you need? We need some bullet control. Men, we need to control the bullets, that’s right. I think all bullets should cost five thousand dollars… five thousand dollars per bullet… You know why? Cause if a bullet cost five thousand dollars there would be no more innocent bystanders.

Yeah! Every time somebody get shot we’d say, ‘Damn, he must have done something ... Shit, he’s got fifty thousand dollars worth of bullets in his ass.’

And people would think before they killed somebody if a bullet cost five thousand dollars. ‘Man I would blow your fucking head off…if I could afford it.’ ‘I’m gonna get me another job, I’m going to start saving some money, and you’re a dead man. You’d better hope I can’t get no bullets on layaway.’

So even if you get shot by a stray bullet, you wouldn't have to go to no doctor to get it taken out. Whoever shot you would take their bullet back, like "I believe you got my property.”

― Chris Rock; +Dean Budd but that then creates in-equality... based on 'income'... as for some people tens and even hundreds of thousands is no big deal...
